ViewObject.Name: SubmittedBatchesView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select esi_batch_id,batch_name,trunc(batch_date) batch_date,batch_status,purchase_order_number,vessel_names, notes,trunc(batch_submitted_date) batch_submitted_date, (select count(*) from rmi_seafarer.rmi_seafarers_iface where rmi_seafarer.rmi_seafarers_iface.esi_batch_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.esi_batch_id) No_of_seafarer, (select order_number from OE_ORDER_HEADERS_ALL where OE_ORDER_HEADERS_ALL.header_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.oe_header_id) work_order_no, created_by, 'Workflow status' workflow_status, (SELECT hp_ship.party_name party_name FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.deliver_to_cust_account_id) ordering_customer_name, (SELECT hca.account_number FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.deliver_to_cust_account_id) account_number, decode(expedited_processing,'N','false','Y','true','false') expedited_processing_submit , (SELECT hp_ship.party_name party_name FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.bill_to_cust_account_id) paying_customer_name, (SELECT hp_ship.party_name party_name FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.ship_to_cust_account_id) shipping_customer_name, ord.order_hold, ord.header_id from rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface, SICD_ORDERS2_VW ord where oe_header_id = ord.header_id and batch_submitted_by = :pUserId and batch_status in ('Submitted','Cancelled','Resubmitted') union select esi_batch_id,batch_name,trunc(batch_date) batch_date,batch_status,purchase_order_number,vessel_names, notes,trunc(batch_submitted_date) batch_submitted_date, (select count(*) from rmi_seafarer.rmi_seafarers_iface where rmi_seafarer.rmi_seafarers_iface.esi_batch_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.esi_batch_id) No_of_seafarer, (select order_number from OE_ORDER_HEADERS_ALL where OE_ORDER_HEADERS_ALL.header_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.oe_header_id) work_order_no, created_by, 'workflow status' workflow_status, (SELECT hp_ship.party_name party_name FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.deliver_to_cust_account_id) ordering_customer_name, (SELECT hca.account_number FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.deliver_to_cust_account_id) account_number, decode(expedited_processing,'N','false','Y','true','false') expedited_processing_submit , (SELECT hp_ship.party_name party_name FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.bill_to_cust_account_id) paying_customer_name, (SELECT hp_ship.party_name party_name FROM hz_parties hp_ship, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE 1 = 1 AND hca.account_name = 'SICD' AND hca.party_id = hp_ship.party_id and hca.cust_account_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.ship_to_cust_account_id) shipping_customer_name, ord.order_hold , ord.header_id from rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface, SICD_ORDERS2_VW ord where (deliver_TO_CUST_ACCOUNT_ID IN (SELECT ordering_agent_account_id FROM rmi_seafarer.rmi_user_order_agent_map WHERE USER_ID=:pUserId) or (select user_type from rmi_seafarer.rmi_user where user_id = :pUserId) = 'Internal') and batch_status in ('Submitted','Cancelled','Resubmitted') and 'My Companies Orders' = (select view_orders from rmi_seafarer.rmi_user where USER_ID = :pUserId) and ((select user_type from rmi_seafarer.rmi_user where user_id = :pUserId) = (select user_type from rmi_seafarer.rmi_user where user_id = rmi_seafarer.rmi_batch_iface.created_by)) and oe_header_id = ord.header_id and batch_submitted_by != :pUserId order by batch_date asc
